# Large Test Skill

This is a large test skill used for performance benchmarking.

## Purpose

Used to measure performance for large bundle operations and stress testing.

## Contents

- Many files (~5MB total)
- 5 dependencies
- Complex skill structure

## Dependencies

This skill depends on:
- small-test-skill: Provides basic functionality
- medium-test-skill: Provides intermediate features
- another-skill-1: Additional utility 1
- another-skill-2: Additional utility 2
- another-skill-3: Additional utility 3
